events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the engineering team for a software developer role.
A recruiter from the engineering department has been assigned to assist you throughout the hiring process.
The initial screening interview has been completed successfully, and we are impressed with your technical background.
Thank you for your prompt response to our screening feedback and confirming your availability for the next steps.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 5th at 10 AM UTC to assess your coding and problem-solving skills.
